mapper.select: SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_image, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT as p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT as pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id
SELECT * FROM PROMOTION_PRODUCT WHERE promotion_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE p.promotion_id = #{p.promotion_id}

SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE (#{param1} = 'all' OR p.product_kind = #{param1}) AND (#{param2} = 'all' OR p.product_category = #{param2})
SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE WEEK(p.product_regdate) = WEEK(CURDATE())
SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE p.product_sales >= 50 ORDER BY p.product_sales DESC
SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE pmp.promotion_discount > 0
SELECT p.*, pmp.promotion_discount FROM PRODUCT AS p JOIN PROMOTION_PRODUCT AS pmp ON p.promotion_id = pmp.promotion_id WHERE p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(promotion_id, product_kind, product_category, product_name, product_description, product_price, product_stock, product_sales, product_mainimagepath, product_rating) VALUE (#{promotion_id}, #{product_kind}, #{product_category}, #{product_name}, #{product_description}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, #{product_sales}, #{product_mainimagepath}, #{product_rating})
